casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2008-0419. State v. Person.

Hamilton App. No. C-060656,174 Ohio App.3d 287, 2007-Ohio-6869. Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. II; cause held for the decision in 2007-0184, State v. Brown, Cuyahoga App. No. 87651, 2006-Ohio-6267; and briefing schedule stayed.

Lundberg Stratton and Cupp, JJ., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law Nos. I and III. Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
